$$
\sigma(x) = \frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}
$$

$$
softmax(x_i) = \frac{e^{x_i}}{\sum{^n}{_{j=1}}e^{x^j}}
$$
**Swish/SiLU**

$$
SiLU(x) = x*sigmoid(x)=x*\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}
$$
